definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The fact that you were den leader in your Cub Scouttroop is irrelevant.
sentences.chinese: 你在童子军做教练员就是无关的信息。

sentences.english: Some boy scouts from the city were on a camping trip.
sentences.chinese: 一些城市里来的童子军孩子们在野外露营。

sentences.english: The boy scouts are taught to do a good deed a day.
sentences.chinese: 这些童子军被教导要日行一善。

sentences.english: The fact that you were den leader in your Cub Scout troop is irrelevant.
sentences.chinese: 你在童子军做童子军教练员就是无关的信息。

sentences.english: The fact that you were den leader in your Cub Scout troop is irrelevant.
sentences.chinese: 你在童子军做童子军教练员就是无关的信息。

sentences.english: Scouting is open to a variety of age groups.
sentences.chinese: 童子军活动向各不同年龄段的青少年开放。

sentences.english: Hey, I was in the Scouts too.
Five Brownies stand in the position of the stars of the Southern Cross.
sentences.chinese: 五个女童子军站成南十字星的形状。

sentences.english: In fact, I am not affiliated with the Scouts at all.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，事实上我并不属于任何童子军。

sentences.english: Today, my son couldn't find all the parts to his Cub Scout uniform.
sentences.chinese: 今天儿子发现他的童子军制服少了几件。

sentences.english: I also volunteered with the Boy Scout troop that I had been affiliated with while I was in my teens.
sentences.chinese: 我还为自己十来岁时就参加过的男童子军做志愿者。

sentences.english: A Girl Scout troop sold valentines and donated $300.
sentences.chinese: 一个女童子军卖情人节礼物，捐赠了300美元。

sentences.english: Undeniable, the boy scout of Guangdong had some passive factors to education too.
sentences.chinese: 不可否认，广东的童子军教育也存有一些消极的因素。

sentences.english: In turn, family involvement is vital to the success of the Cub Scout program.
sentences.chinese: 同样，家庭的参与对于童子军的项目也至关重要。
“这要归功于我的童子军训练，”吉夫说。

sentences.english: It was Muhannad’s Scout membership that drew him into the uprising.
sentences.chinese: 正是穆罕纳德的童子军身份让他加入起义的。

definition: Scout (youth organization)/see also 童子軍|童子军[Tong2 zi3 jun1]
able-bodied man (capable of fighting in a war)
special detachment/commando/an armed secret agent squad
